name: Hide & Seek! [MHYK]
description:
A short game starring the young witch, Alina Astraea! Master Sage had entrusted her with their prize possession, but now it seems missing. Will this frantic girl be able to find it?

The setting and characters of Shylock and Nero are from Promise of Wizard, or Mahoutsukai No Yakusoku. The character of Solaris belongs to Aria. The character of Rae belongs to Grey. Alina belongs to me. I am not affiliated with Coly in any way, shape or form.
